snippet: ABC News is seeking recognition for its work on a prize-winning investigation into sick Appalachian miners who were denied medical care and benefits.
abstract: Dispute has erupted over Pulitzer Prize for investigative reporting awarded to Chris Hamby, reporter for the Center for Public Integrity; ABC News has asked for share of the credit, but the center has firmly rejected the request.
lead_paragraph: ABC News is seeking recognition for its work on a prize-winning investigation into sick Appalachian miners who were denied medical care and benefits.

headline.main: Credit Sought by ABC News for Pulitzer, but Rejected
headline.print_headline: Credit Sought by ABC News for Pulitzer, but Rejected
